text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 13
Ferreira de Sousa and Costa Araújo v. Portugal - 36257/97

The case concerns the length of proceedings brought against the applicants in February 1991 in respect of an action to determine boundaries. The parties reached a friendly settlement in January 1998. The proceedings therefore lasted around 6 years 11 months.
Article 41 - The Court awarded the applicants 700,000 escudos (PTE) in respect of non-pecuniary damage and 250,000 escudos in respect of costs and expenses.
